channel.title: [TUT] How to flip a Client background [TUT]
channel.description:
..::WARNING::.. This tut is for noobs who cant flip a image! (this is also my first tut)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ok first you need a client backgound, you can either make one yourself or you can get someone to make one for you [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,260157.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,260157.0.html[/url]
Once you have made or got a background you will have to open it up in paint, like this: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2hd5nbq.jpg[/img]
ok, now its in paint you'll need to find te 'half way marker' so you know where to flip it.
this is the marker: [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2wd3k42.png[/img]
now, you need to flip it, so hit the square selection tool: [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/254yohu.png[/img]
no you need to select half of your image so you flip it! just do this: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/szx6dz.png[/img]
half of the picture should now be selected, now right click on the half on the picture you selected and hit 'flip/rotate' then press 'ok' and your picture should now be flipped!
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2psoeqa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2gum62g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/25ji347.png[/img]
Dont foget to save xD
credits:
All to me

    {
        byte abyte0[] = aClass44_1053.method571("title.dat", null);

        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(0, 0, -32357);
        aClass15_1111.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-637, 0, -32357);
        aClass15_1107.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-128, 0, -32357);
        aClass15_1108.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-202, -371, -32357);
        aClass15_1109.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-202, -171, -32357);
        aClass15_1112.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(0, -265, -32357);
        aClass15_1113.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-562, -265, -32357);
        aClass15_1114.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-128, -171, -32357);
        aClass15_1115.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-562, -171, -32357);
        int ai[] = new int[class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440];
        for(int j = 0; j < class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1441; j++)
        {
            for(int k = 0; k < class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440; k++)
                ai[k] = class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anIntArray1439[(class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 - k - 1) + class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 * j];

            for(int l = 0; l < class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440; l++)
                class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anIntArray1439[l + class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 * j] = ai[l];
        }

        /*aClass15_1110.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(382, 0, -32357);

        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-255, 0, -32357);

        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(180, -371, -32357);
        aClass15_1109.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(180, -171, -32357);
        aClass15_1112.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(382, -265, -32357);
        aClass15_1113.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -265, -32357);
        aClass15_1114.method237(0);
        class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(254, -171, -32357);
        aClass15_1115.method237(0);*/
        if(i != 0)
        {
            return;
        } else
        {
            class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357);

item.title: [TUT] How to flip a Client background [TUT]
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_superscape owner of superscape
item.description:
@owner_of_superscape wrote:

…::… This tut is for noobs who cant flip a image! (this is also my first tut)


ok first you need a client backgound, you can either make one yourself or you can get someone to make one for you [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,260157.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,260157.0.html[/url]

Once you have made or got a background you will have to open it up in paint, like this: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2hd5nbq.jpg[/img]



ok, now its in paint you'll need to find te 'half way marker' so you know where to flip it. 

this is the marker:
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2wd3k42.png[/img]

now, you need to flip it, so hit the square selection tool:
 [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/254yohu.png[/img]

no you need to select half of your image so you flip it! just do this: 
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/szx6dz.png[/img]

half of the picture should now be selected, now right click on the half on the picture you selected and hit 'flip/rotate' then press 'ok' and your picture should now be flipped! 

[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2psoeqa.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2gum62g.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/25ji347.png[/img]

Dont foget to save xD
